method.name: POST
method.doc: To run one or multiple pdadmin commands with the RESTful web service, issue an HTTP POST command on the pdadmin resource URI.

request.doc:
POST https://{appliance_hostname}/isam/pdadmin
POST_DATA: { "admin_id":"The administrator id", "admin_pwd":"The administrator password", "commands": [ "The first command to run", "The second command to run", "server list", "server task ..." ] }

param.name: Accept:application/json
param.doc: Required for requests to the service

param.name: admin_id
param.doc: The Security Verify Access administrator name.

param.name: admin_pwd
param.doc: The Security Verify Access administrator password.

param.name: admin_domain
param.doc: The Security Verify Access administration domain. The 'Default' domain will be used if this parameter is not supplied.

response.doc: There is a problem with the request. The JSON message describes the problem.
File not Found, The requested service does not exist. The JSON message indicates which resource.
An internal error occurred. The JSON message indicates the problem.

param.name: result
param.doc: Output from the command, for e.g., cmd> server listn ivmgrd-mastern test-webseald-appliance
